Html: Is there any way how to save current user settings of Ribbon and Data Grid control? Will this feature be implemented in the release version or is there any recommended solution how to accomplish this task?

There are several solutions that exist out there on the web.  In particular, I thought this one, http://secure.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WPF_Control_State_Persist.aspx, was pretty interesting as it uses attached behavior to accomplish the persistence.
